title: What should I write when I send my CV to my company? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would recommend keeping the message short and professional - focus on what you bring in terms of skill set and experience (concisely) to the company that will benefit THEM. They are looking for a great candidate that will solve THEIR issues, problems etc. so show them how you can help them. Seeing this may make them more inclined to read more (your CV) and consider you. Good luck!
